Meet Our Mayor and Council
==========================

*The City of Woodville is a Type A General Law City.*

*The Woodville City Council convenes in regular session at 6:00 p.m. on the second Monday of each month.  All meetings are held in the Council Chambers on the 2nd Floor of City Hall located at 400 W. Bluff Street, Woodville, Texas.*

![ABythewoodW.jpg](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/vertical/Sites/%7B5E66A38A-188A-4196-A941-D6529818A788%7D/uploads/ABythewoodW_Web.jpg)

[Mayor](https://www.woodville-tx.gov/index.asp?SEC=40E6F807-E837-43F7-A457-9A1CF74332E1&DE=52973BC8-0025-4C0C-86B8-15FFDE62DF1E)

#### Location

400 W. Bluff Street Woodville, Texas 75979

Ph. (409) 283-2234 Fax (409) 283-8412

#### Contact Us

Hours 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Monday - Friday (closed noon -12:30 p.m. for lunch)

If you are in need of assistance after hours and on weekends call (409) 283-2172
